title: Prepare the Base
description: Unpack the wooden base and inspect for any damage. Sand lightly if needed and apply wood finish if desired.
notes: Ensure the base is completely dry before proceeding

title: Install the Socket
description: Mount the E26 light socket to the lamp shade using the provided hardware. Ensure it's centered and secure.
notes: Double-check that the socket is firmly attached before wiring

title: Wire the Electrical Components
description: Connect the power cord to the socket using wire nuts. Follow proper electrical safety procedures and color coding.
notes: Turn off power and use a voltage tester before working with electrical components

title: Attach the Arm to Base
description: Secure the articulating arm to the wooden base using the provided bolts. Ensure the arm moves smoothly.
notes: Don't overtighten - the arm should move freely but hold position

title: Mount the Lamp Shade
description: Attach the wired lamp shade to the end of the articulating arm. Route the wire through the arm channels.
notes: Ensure wires are protected and won't be pinched when arm moves

title: Final Assembly and Testing
description: Install the LED bulb, plug in the lamp, and test all functions. Adjust arm positioning and check stability.
notes: Test the switch and ensure the bulb is properly seated
